hero.description: Your ideal partner for tailor-made lamination solutions!

about.title: Your ideal partner for tailor-made lamination solutions!
about.description: ETS Louati Collage, with more than 30 years of experience in the textile industry, is specialized in laminating textiles and various materials. We guarantee high quality and long-lasting results.

quality.title: Discover
quality.subtitle: Our quality policy
quality.description: At ETS Louati Collage, we take pride in offering superior quality work. With first-rate materials and advanced lamination techniques, we guarantee durable and perfectly finished products, meeting the highest standards to satisfy our customers.

contact.title: Stay in touch
contact.description: Have a question or need help? Contact us by email, phone or via the contact form below. We look forward to helping you.

form.name: Full name
form.name_error: Username must be at least 3 characters long
form.email_error: Email must be a valid email
form.phone_error: Phone number must be composed from 8 numbers
form.message_error: Message must be at least {{count}} characters long
